trans-unit.source: Defines objects used to fill the interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
trans-unit.target: Definisce gli oggetti usati per riempire le parti interne di forme grafiche quali rettangoli, ellissi, torte, poligoni e percorsi.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract base class and cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta di una classe base astratta e non può essere creata un'istanza.

trans-unit.source: To create a brush object, use classes derived from Brush, such as <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>, <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un oggetto brush, utilizzare le classi derivate da pennello, ad esempio <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>, <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush>e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, crea una copia esatta di questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> creato da questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate da questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata a Dispose consente le risorse usate da questo <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>oggetto riallocazione per altri scopi.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>occupata.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush> </xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate da di <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose()`(metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro è true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>riferimenti.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Consente a un oggetto tentare di liberare risorse ed eseguire altre operazioni di pulizia prima che venga recuperato da garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, sets a reference to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] brush object.
trans-unit.target: In una classe derivata, imposta un riferimento a un [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] oggetto brush.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] brush object.
trans-unit.target: Un puntatore al [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] oggetto brush.
